txt.en: Winiel has come to the Water-works, seeking the lost knowledge of the dwarves.

'Well met, [placeholder]. It is good that you have come to me. I see in your eyes the hunger for knowledge that drove me to greater pursuits in ages long passed.

'Here in the Water-works, it is easy to find odd bits of dwarf-knowledge thought lost to the ages. If you are up to the task, I would have you gather some of these texts and bring them to me.  It is likely we will both end up learning a great deal together.

'Your search should focus upon the larger buildings in the Water-works as well as any large gatherings of foul creatures here. Return to me when you have found a significant amount of material for us to study.'
Lore-fragments can be found throughout the Water-works.\n\nWiniel has asked you to search for lore-fragments of the ancient dwarves.
'Well done, [placeholder]. These will prove most valuable in the days to come.\n\n'We must move on to your next task, for we have little time to lose.'
Winiel is at the Rotting Cellar in the Water-works.\n\nYou should bring the lore-fragments back to Winiel.

'Continue your search for more lost knowledge here in the Water-works.\n\n'Such knowledge is likely to be in and around the larger buildings here, but I would not be surprised to hear that some of the local wildlife have gathered them up out of curiosity.'
Take the lore-fragments back to Winiel
Take the lore fragments back to Tithenorn
